channel.title: Create a ZBWorker on Zeebe Node.js Client Guide
channel.description: Recent content in Create a ZBWorker on Zeebe Node.js Client Guide

item.title: Worker Overview
item.description: This section contains conceptual background and reference material that may be overwhelming initially. Feel free to continually refer back to this section as you need to. The ZBClient method createWorker creates a new ZBWorker to service jobs. A job is a specific, concrete instance of a task from a running workflow. A ZBWorker is created for a specific task type, and continuously polls the broker for jobs of that task type.
